name: Before It's News® Mainstream Stories
author: Before It's News®

sections.description: The Mainstream Stories widget will widget will update every time our site does. A new story is added virtually every minute! Stay up to date and keep your viewers up to date. The widget loads fast and won’t bog down your page-load time.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘bin-mainstream.php’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Drag the widget to any available widget area in the ‘Widgets’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Before It's News® Widget that displays the lates Mainstream Stories.
